name: effortless cardigan
notes:
the cardigan is worked in one piece from the neck downwards. piece is divided at the underarms then body and sleeves are worked separately.

sizes: xs (s, m, l, 1x) 
finished bust about 34 (38½, 42, 45½, 49½) in. (86.5 (98, 106.5, 115.5, 125.5) cm), not including front bands 

finished length about 24¼ (26¼, 26¼, 26¼, 26¼) in. (61.5 (66.5, 66.5, 66.5, 66.5) cm)

lion brand® basic stitch premium (art. #201)
(219yd/200m) (3.5oz/100g) 100% acrylic
#150 slate 4 (5, 5, 6, 6) balls

circular knitting needle size 7 (4.5 mm), 29 in. (73.5 cm) long

gauge: 18 sts + 24 rows = about 4 in. (10 cm) in st st
